projects.title: Golpogatha
projects.description: Stricken Sie Ihre Gedanken in geschichte, story writing plattform, kollaboratives story writing mit der welt, einfachste MÃ¶glichkeit, ihre Gedanken mit der Welt zu teilen
features: Benutzerprofil
Geschichte lesen und schreiben
Geben und Nehmen Reaktionen der Geschichte
Kommentieren und mit Freunden teilen
Laden Sie die Geschichte als PDF zum Offline-Lesen herunter
Separate Kapitel
Schreibe eine Geschichte gemeinsam mit jemand anderem

projects.title: Electronic Voting Machine
projects.description: Project for study subject where users (student) can elect someone by online voting
features: Admin Panel
Set election by selecting candidates
Create, update or delete candidates
Send email to students who are capable of participating to particular election
Student can give vote to onl one candidate with the token given in mail
Admins can count votes and declare the winner for an election

projects.title: Scan & Park
projects.description: Another project from study course where I am responsible for designing the REST backend and admin panel for smart parking for residential users
features: Admin Panel
Mobile Application (Cross Platform)
REST Bckend in NodeJS, Sequelize and MySql
Admin can create parking slots with unique QR barcode
Admin can ban or remove unauthorized user
User can register/login with the app to book an available slot
User can scan the QR barcode for booking and leaving the slot
